trans-unit.source: Animates an image that has time-based frames.
trans-unit.target: Animerer et bilde som er basert på tidspunktet for forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: Displays a multiple-frame image as an animation.
trans-unit.target: Viser en flere rammens bilde som en animasjon.
Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objekt for å animere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventHandler" name="EventHandler" href=""></xref> object that specifies the method that is called when the animation frame changes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventHandler" name="EventHandler" href=""> </xref> objekt som angir metoden som kalles når animasjonen rammen endres.

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the specified image contains time-based frames.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en boolsk verdi som angir om det angitte bildet inneholder time-baserte forhandleren.
Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objekt for å teste.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified image contains time-based frames; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis det angitte bildet inneholder time-baserte forhandleren; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object to stop animating.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objekt for å stoppe animere.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventHandler" name="EventHandler" href=""></xref> object that specifies the method that is called when the animation frame changes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventHandler" name="EventHandler" href=""> </xref> objekt som angir metoden som kalles når animasjonen rammen endres.

trans-unit.source: Advances the frame in all images currently being animated.
trans-unit.target: Flytter rammen i alle bilder blir animerte.

trans-unit.source: The new frame is drawn the next time the image is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den nye rammen tegnes neste gang bildet gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Advances the frame in the specified image.
trans-unit.target: Flytter rammen i det angitte bildet.

trans-unit.source: The new frame is drawn the next time the image is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Den nye rammen tegnes neste gang bildet gjengis.

trans-unit.source: This method applies only to images with time-based frames.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gjelder bare for bilder med klokkeslett forhandleren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> object for which to update frames.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objekt som du vil oppdatere forhandleren.
